data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Midway, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Midway, United States Minor Outlying Islands
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: the state of Midway has (about) 40 people who know Jesus, 58 people who know about him culturally, and 2 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, please raise up prophets in Midway who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 40 believers in Midway, United States Minor Outlying Islands who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Midway, United States Minor Outlying Islands.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 100 people living in Midway through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Midway, United States Minor Outlying Islands to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.focus_label: Midway, United States Minor Outlying Islands

location.name: Midway
location.full_name: Midway, United States Minor Outlying Islands
